nodes.text: Z2-B3 was an astromech droid that served Admiral Zasha Ranken of the reconstituted Sith Empire's Navy aboard Vaiken Spacedock during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic.

Z2-B3 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Starfighter, a Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as the Imperial Flashpoint courier for the Kuat Drive Yards Flashpoint, though the droid is only found aboard Vaiken Spacedock and not on other planets like other couriers.
